bib.title: Fitness Caching-From a Minor Mechanism to Major Consequences in Modern Evolutionary Computation
bib.author: Przewozniczek, Michal W and Komarnicki, Marcin M
bib.abstract: In the field of Evolutionary Computation, the main objective is to find a high-quality solution to the considered problem. However, the other important issue is to find a solution efficiently. Therefore, evolutionary methods use various techniques to adjust to the problem and reduce the amount of resources consumed during an optimization process. One of the well-known and relatively simple techniques is storing the already evaluated genotypes and their ratings.
